name: myaria
0:
”Alexa launch my aria”
”Alexa open my aria”
”Alexa load my aria”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my aria
des:
Aria bot skill is connect the customer with a chatbot. The chatbot is an enterprise public application that has been hosted in azure. The users can ask enterprise related queries to the chatbot and the chatbot responses through alexa. 

Users can ask FAQ related questions to the chatbot.

Sample Utterances:

HR Policies.
